}} 'Otis Jackson Jr.' (born October 24, 1973 in Oxnard, California), known
professionally as 'Madlib', is a Los Angeles-based DJ, multi-instrumentalist,
rapper, and music producer. Known under a plethora of pseudonyms, he is one of
the most prolific and critically acclaimed hip hop producers of the 2000s and
has collaborated with a myriad of hip hop artists, including MF DOOM (as
Madvillain), and the late J Dilla (as Jaylib). Madlib has described himself as a
"DJ first, producer second, and MC last," Aziri
(2002). Mugshot Magazine, Vol 2, Issue 3, 2003 and he has done
several projects as a DJ, mixer, or remixer.
